metadata.description:
"while exploring the fundamental simplicity of melody played on a stringed instruments, it was discovered that we are amazingly error tolerant. this 4 track ep explores the underlying reasons why humans make mistakes. human cognitive processes are wired to make us fast and flexible, but speed and flexibility come at a price." (soundrix)
"the human error ep has got this light, transparent mood, that timeless waves and the perfect, unique soundrix-guitar sound. it is a sceptical, but also bright look into our future, into our human nature. a mixed mood of standing and moving, of flying and thinking. it does have a meaningful layer beyound the music. something to explore and think about while listening." (020200)
metadata.title: soundrix - human error ep [63_047]
metadata.subject: Alternative;Indie-tronica
